Description: Foot and stem sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; small flat foot; slightly raised ring at base of stem; glazed black on interior and exterior; reserved underside and outer face of foot; inscription cut in underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 490)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1477)
